name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_ALL_CPU_EVENT_SST_PP
summary: Verify all CPUs in system-wide which core base_frequency excursion occurred due to Intel Speed Select Technology - Performance profile feature in duration by command: perf stat -a -e pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/ sleep 60
